scripts.link-scripts:
ln -sf ../../packages/hardchor-scripts/build/index.js ./node_modules/.bin/hardchor-scripts && echo '
>>> Remove me once https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn/issues/3911 and https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn/issues/3421 are resolved! <<<
'
scripts.preinstall: yarn workspace @hardchor/scripts install --ignore-scripts && yarn workspace @hardchor/scripts build && yarn link-scripts
